data.title: Turkey: Further information on Medical Action: Harassment of Human Rights Foundation, Diyarbakir
data.meta_description: Following the raid on the office of the Human Rights Foundation of Turkey (HRFT) in Diyarbakir on 7 September 2001, a trial has been opened against HRFT lawyer Sezgin Tanrikulu (38-years-old) for establishing a medical treatment and rehabilitation centre without seeking permission from the relevant authorities. The first trial hearing has been scheduled for 19 [â€¦]
data.text:
Following the raid on the office of the Human Rights Foundation of Turkey (HRFT) in Diyarbakir on 7 September 2001, a trial has been opened against HRFT lawyer Sezgin Tanrikulu (38-years-old) for establishing a medical treatment and rehabilitation centre without seeking permission from the relevant authorities. The first trial hearing has been scheduled for 19 March 2002.

Choose a language to view report
